title: The Auction Book 1: BDSM Slave Auction Gangbang Rough Erotic Short Story
description: Peggy didn't think her husband would catch her smoking during the day of their annual neighborhood yard sale--nor did she expect her punishment to include being one of the items for sale.But she's about to learn when she toes the line, there are consequences. Content is for 18+, intense BDSM, rough anal, CNC, M/F/M, DP, and enema play. This is a dark, intense, wicked read, if that's not your cup of tea, tread with caution.
author: Elena K. Salvatore
